text: How to Be Very, Very Popular is a 1955 comedy movie directed by Nunnally Johnson is based on the 1933 novel She Loves Me Not by Edward Hope. It stars Betty Grable, Sheree North, Bob Cummings, Charles Coburn, Tommy Noonan, Orson Bean and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies
title: How to Be Very, Very Popular
